title: Sakura Serenity: Matcha Ceremony on a Bamboo Table
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, high definition 3D render, tranquil Japanese tea ceremony setup on a bright green bamboo slatted table. Close-up, focusing on the details of the cast iron kettle (tetsubin) on a burner, a white matcha bowl (chawan) with a bamboo whisk (chasen), and a cherry blossom tea caddy. The scene is illuminated by soft natural light filtering through a traditional shoji screen on the right. In the background, visible through the opening, is a serene Japanese Zen garden featuring large grey rocks, a flowing waterfall, a blue stream, and a vibrant pink blooming cherry blossom (sakura) tree. Studio Ghibli style, volumetric lighting, shallow depth of field, 9:16 aspect ratio.
